[i](As an Encounter enters, choose an opponent to protect it. When defense counters are removed, create a 0/0 black Army creature token if you don't control one, then put that many +1/+1 counters on an Army you control.)[/i]
When this battle enters, draw a card. You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.
When this battle is defeated, at the beginning of the next end step, return it from your graveyard to the battlefield if you've spent five or more mana to cast spells this turn.
